sentences.sContent: A huge tusk decorated the wall of his study.
sentences.sContent_eng: A huge tusk decorated the wall of his study.
sentences.sCn: 他书房的墙上装饰着一支巨大的象牙。

sentences.sContent: I wonder how much elephant tusk, rhino horn or a stuffed lion will cost when they vanish.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wonder how much elephant tusk, rhino horn or a stuffed lion will cost when they vanish.
sentences.sCn: 我好奇当他们都绝迹的时候，象牙，犀牛角以及狮子标本会值多少钱。

remMethod.val: 保护好自己的长牙(tusk)是大象们的重要任务(task)之一

words.tran: 有长牙的动物（象，野猪等）

trans.tranOther: one of a pair of very long pointed teeth, that stick out of the mouth of animals such as  elephants
